io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder

Class StaticEffectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.effectbuilder.StaticEffectBuilder

  • public class StaticEffectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A small helper class for creating simple static-type effects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StaticEffectBuilder(Aurora controller)
      Creates a new instance of an StaticEffectBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • getFrames

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Frame> getFrames()
        Gets a map of the frames for this effect. The key represents the panel and the value represents the frame for the corresponding panel.
        Returns:
        a map of the frames for this effect

      • build

        public Effect build(java.lang.String effectName)
             throws StatusCodeException,
                    StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Creates a new static-type effect using the animation data from the StaticEffectBuilder.
        Parameters:
        effectName - the desired effect name
        Returns:
        a new custom-type effect
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

      • setPanel

        public StaticEffectBuilder setPanel(Panel panel,
                                    Frame frame)
        Adds a new frame (RGBW color and transition time) to the effect.
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel to add the frame to
        frame - the RGBW color and transition time
        Returns:
        the current StaticEffectBuilder

      • setPanel

        public StaticEffectBuilder setPanel(int panelId,

        Parameters:
        panelId - the panelId of the panel to add the frame to

        Returns:
